name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FB QuickStory - Post Video Stories on Facebook from Desktop

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post Video Stories on Facebook from Desktop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook Video Story Uploader

Easily upload and share your video stories on Facebook with just a few clicks! The Facebook Video Story Uploader extension enhances your Facebook experience by enabling video uploads in the Create a Story section, which is otherwise limited to photos. With this tool, you can select and preview your videos before posting them on your Facebook story, all within the familiar interface.

Key Features:

Video Upload Support: Seamlessly upload video files in addition to photos to your Facebook stories.
Real-Time Preview: Instantly preview your selected video before posting, ensuring you’re sharing the perfect story.
Easy-to-Use: Simply install the extension, and it automatically modifies the Facebook story creation tool to accept video files.
Fully Compatible: Works with Facebook’s desktop version and integrates seamlessly with the platform’s existing UI.
No Ads or Tracking: Focus on what matters most—your video stories. No ads or tracking, just a clean experience.
How it Works: Once installed, the extension automatically enhances the Facebook story creation page. When you go to post a story, it will allow you to upload videos (not just photos) and provide a preview before submission.
